description: Mobile techniques used by DressCode, ATT&CK software S0300 (v1.0)
name: DressCode (S0300)

techniques.comment: [DressCode](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0300) sets up a "general purpose tunnel" that can be used by an adversary to compromise enterprise networks that the mobile device is connected to.(Citation: TrendMicro-DressCode)
